about_the_game:
Embark upon a wild journey into the Old World, filled with mystery, magic, and action-packed adventure.

Take control of Tinker, a cybernetically enhanced mountain lion thrown into a journey of self-discovery in a land where machines are forbidden. Fight your way through hazardous monsters, capture new spirits to help you on your quest, and build up an array of elemental abilities to add to your arsenal.

Explore a vast world filled with hand-drawn art, traditional 2D animation, skillful gameplay, intimidating bosses, with a story and music that will take you on a personal journey. Meet an array of strange characters, master the elemental monsters you tame and search the unique locations of this world as you unravel the secrets of the past and bring balance to the world. 

Fulfill your destiny while engaging in hack and slash combat, gaining skill points, leveling up your stats, capturing elemental spirits, and using them to improve your combat abilities, or to progress further in the world.
